title: How to Conduct an Odinist Ritual

steps.title: Purify yourself by washing your body and dressing in a shroud that is pure and white, red or black.
steps.content: Purify yourself by washing your body and dressing in a shroud that is pure and white, red or black. Then wait for the darkness of night.

steps.title: After the descent of the sun, position yourself before a luminous object.
steps.content: After the descent of the sun, position yourself before a luminous object. This may be any source of light, from a candle to the starfire in the sky.

steps.title: Stand erect with your eyes and arms raised and declare these words:
steps.content: Stand erect with your eyes and arms raised and declare these words: "A man without gods has a desert in his heart."

steps.title: For many heartbeats, stand motionless.
steps.content: For many heartbeats, stand motionless. When a person is still, the poets say he is moving through time without moving through space.

steps.title: Next, touch all the gods and goddesses of Asgard by naming them one by one.
steps.content: Next, touch all the gods and goddesses of Asgard by naming them one by one. According to the ancients, naming is a kind of touching, for the name is a part of the thing. Remember all the gods/goddesses of the Aesir and Vanir.

steps.title: After touching all the gods and goddesses, you must advance to the final and most mystical part of “The-Rite-of-Bragi.”
steps.content: After touching all the gods and goddesses, you must advance to the final and most mystical part of “The-Rite-of-Bragi.” Still standing before a luminous object, select one god or one goddess from the sacred pantheon. Then—in the cauldron of thought— in the crucible called imagination—visualize yourself as the deity you have selected.

steps.title: If the visualization is successful--if you literally see yourself as one of the gods or goddesses--you will experience “The-Glimpse-of-Extraordinary-Beauty,” and you will be enveloped and penetrated by the thoughts of a god or a goddess.
steps.content: If the visualization is successful--if you literally see yourself as one of the gods or goddesses--you will experience “The-Glimpse-of-Extraordinary-Beauty,” and you will be enveloped and penetrated by the thoughts of a god or a goddess.
